name: Room for Growth (Skill Card)
text:
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
During your Main Phase, you can increase the ATK of 1 Level 3 or lower monster you control by 300 x its Level, until the end of this turn.
Flip this card over at the end of the turn you activated this Skill.
